issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I downloaded and installed Titanium Studio version 3.2.3 in my Windows 8.1 64 bit Operating system and the installation completed successfully.

After I opened the Titanium Application, I got the screen to download and install the Android / Blackberry / Tizen Platform and unable to install any of these and getting error messages.

I am also attaching the error screenshot.

Kindly help me to make the application work.

Thanks in Advance.

Hemananth13
fields.summary: Configuring Android fails - Error Encountered during update

comments.body:
Hello!

Please go to the menu help, then Titanium Studio, then clean the log. Reproduce the issue (updating) and share with us the log. 

Thanks!
Customer hasn't replied to us yet.
